caption:
This photograph captures a serene golf setting with a picturesque ocean backdrop. In the foreground, there is a sloping golf course with several people engaged in the sport. One person, standing on the right, appears to be taking a shot, possibly finishing their swing. Nearby, on the left, there is a golf cart parked on the edge of the grass, with two individuals seated inside, enjoying the activity or possibly waiting their turn to play.

The middle of the image presents a well-manicured lawn bordered by tropical vegetation, including some vibrant red flowers that add a splash of color to the mostly green and blue scene. Beyond the golf course, the composition features tall palm trees that stand under a hazy sky, framing a view of the shimmering ocean that extends to the horizon.

The overall ambience of the photograph is peaceful and leisurely, set in a beautiful coastal location that blends the green expanses of the golf course with the natural beauty of the seaside landscape.
title: Golf course built on lava bed near Kailua on the west coast makes good use of land which might not have been suitable for agriculture.
